to

if(npcs[i].npcType == 1645 || npcs[i].npcType == 509 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || npcs[i].npcType == 1246) {

It’s only a few lines from the top.

That’s the only other problem I see. Keep the bracket that meiscooldude told you to put.

item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

[code] } if (npcs[i].npcType == 131) //HERE IS YOUR PROB… put a { here…

                                                    if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
					{
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("R E B 0 R N"))
						{
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "R E B 0 R N is ONLINE";
						}
						else
						{
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "R E B 0 R N is OFFLINE";
						}
			[/code]

… the error … no class or da da da found, almost always refers to a braket missing, which can really be a D to find. Im almost 100 % sure that was your problem… (look at the code above… top right)
